summary: 2013 WILDCAT STERLING.  CONSUMER WRITES IN REGARDS TO SUB-STANDARD TIRES ON VEHICLE AT TIME OF DELIVERY FROM THE MANUFACTURER.  *SMD  THE CONSUMER STATED FROM MAY 2012 TO AUGUST 2014, HE EXPERIENCED TWO INCIDENTS OF TIRE DAMAGE RESULTING FROM THE TREAD SEPARATING FROM THE TIRE ON EACH OCCURRENCE. AFTER THE SECOND BLOWOUT, THE CONSUMER HAD ALL OF THE TIRES REPLACED.  THE TECHNICIAN INFORMED THE CONSUMER, THE REMAINING THREE TIRES WERE IN THE PROCESS OF SEPARATING AS WELL.  THE CONSUMER STATED THE LAST BLOWOUT CAUSED DAMAGE TO THE RV. *JB
